content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --ENTPT
      operator: is_empty
    - name: --ENRTPT
      operator: is_empty
CoreId: ValuePresenceExample
Description: Raise an error when --ENTPT is empty, --ENRTPT is also empty
Outcome:
  Message: --ENTPT is empty and --ENRTPT is also empty
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Version: '1'
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0354
            Version: '1.1'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: (--ENRTPT) Identifies the end of the observation as
                  being before or after the sponsor-defined reference time point defined
                  by variable --ENTPT.
                Document: SDTM v1.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 2.2.5 Timing Variables for All Classes
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL
Core:
  Status: Draft

json.Description: Raise an error when --ENTPT is empty, --ENRTPT is also empty

Outcome.Message: --ENTPT is empty and --ENRTPT is also empty

Citations.Cited_Guidance: (--ENRTPT) Identifies the end of the observation as being before or after the sponsor-defined reference time point defined by variable --ENTPT.
